title: Life magazine
content: Any idea what are these life magazine fonts?
author: gnagore

comments.content:
Nothing digital will match exactly, but here are some approximates:

[Bureau Grot](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/bureau_grot_condensed/)  
 [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/trade_gothic_no_20_condensed_bold/)  
 [Monotype Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/grotesque_2_monotype_std/)
Franklin Gothic Extra Condensed for the masthead ?

[Not quite.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/franklin_gothic_std_extra_condensed_ot/?sample_text=LIFE&sample_size=288&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) We've tried to match the logo before. I feel like it was probably hand drawn.
I agree with you Stephen, since it's white on red, it could not have been done with lead or wood type, could it ?
It can easily be done with photocompositing.

The date at the bottom is [Alternate Gothic No. 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130812015718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/alternate_gothic_virtual/?sample_text=NOVEMBER%2023%2C%201936&sample_size=36).
